news.title: Private payrolls rose 41,000 in December, slightly below expectations, ADP says
news.summary: Private sector job creation turned positive in December though at a bit softer pace than expected. Private sector jobs creation in December was positive, though a bit slower than expected, according to the government.

news.title: WBD once again rejects Paramount offer in favor of Netflix deal
news.summary: Discovery's board still sees its deal with Netflix as the superior option over Paramount's recently amended hostile offer. Warner Bros. still sees Netflix deal as superior option.

news.title: eVTOL maker Joby buys new Ohio factory, more than doubles manufacturing footprint as it vies for FAA approval
news.summary: Joby's expansion comes as electric air taxi companies race to gain Federal Aviation Administration certification to start flying their aircrafts commercially. Joby will be the first of its kind in the U.S.

news.title: Watch Energy Secretary Chris Wright answer questions about Venezuela
news.summary: Wright will be interviewed by Goldman Sachs at the bank's annual energy conference in Miami. Wright will be on the panel at Goldman Sachs' energy conference.

news.title: Why Trump wants Greenland — and what makes it so important for national security
news.summary: Greenland, a vast and sparsely populated self-governing Danish territory, has been thrust into the geopolitical spotlight once again. Greenland is a vast, sparsely populate self-Governing Danish Territory.

news.title: ‘We track our finances religiously’: Are we obliged to pay for our daughter’s medical school? We have $2.6 million saved for retirement.
news.summary: “I am retired, and my wife is an employed physician,” he says. “She is 56 and would like to retire as well.”

news.title: Businesses add 41,000 jobs in December, ADP says. U.S. jobs market not getting any worse.
news.summary: ADP says businesses created 41,000 jobs in December. That suggests a weak U.S. labor market showed mild improvement heading into the new year.

news.title: The last bearish overhang for crude — Venezuela — is now gone. Why one trader says oil will follow in gold’s footsteps.
news.summary: Energy bears had one last hope: a Venezuelan production ramp. That’s over and the energy sector has never been cheaper, says Kevin Muir.

news.title: AI won’t pay off if employees can’t do the work it demands
news.summary: The U.S. urgently needs an education and workforce effort that can handle the significant changes stemming from AI. The education effort should focus on how to prepare people for the changes in the workplace.

news.title: GameStop follows Tesla’s lead by tying its CEO’s pay to these ‘extraordinary growth’ targets
news.summary: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen would see a huge stock-options package if he can grow the company’s market cap by about 1,000% and hit new profit targets.
